title: Loving Hut - Cape Coral
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Casual. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and dessert. Sample dishes include fried wontons with shiitake mushroom, avocado salad, rice noodle bowls, and combination platters with textured vegetable protein, and vegan desserts.
